name: $active
desc: Study is completed prematurely and will not resume; patients are no longer examined nor treated.

name: $administratively-completed
desc: Protocol is approved by the review board.

name: $approved
desc: Study is closed for accrual; patients can be examined and treated.

name: $closed-to-accrual
desc: Study is closed to accrual and intervention, i.e. the study is closed to enrollment, all study subjects have completed treatment or intervention but are still being followed according to the primary objective of the study.

name: $closed-to-accrual-and-intervention
desc:
Study is closed to accrual and intervention, i.e. the study is closed to enrollment, all study subjects have completed treatment
or intervention but are still being followed according to the primary objective of the study.

name: $completed
desc: Protocol was disapproved by the review board.

name: $disapproved
desc: Protocol is submitted to the review board for approval.

name: $in-review
desc: Study is temporarily closed for accrual; can be potentially resumed in the future; patients can be examined and treated.

name: $temporarily-closed-to-accrual
desc: Study is temporarily closed for accrual and intervention and potentially can be resumed in the future.

name: $temporarily-closed-to-accrual-and-intervention
desc: Protocol was withdrawn by the lead organization.
